Dear Parent_E,

To advise you realistically: if you would like to remain under consideration, please confirm (1) the latest date by which you need a firm decision, and (2) your preferred start date window. If we reach a point where we can make an offer to you, we would be able to move quickly.

Nursery_A Admissions

2) Preferred start-date window: We are flexible. Ideal start would be anytime within the next 2–6 weeks, but we can start earlier (as soon as next week) or later if needed.
